actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to allow a deduction for certain amounts paid for food and lodging while away from home for purposes of receiving medical care.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow a limited income tax deduction for meals and lodging expenses while away from home primarily for receiving medical care.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to allow a deduction for certain amounts paid for food and lodging while away from home for purposes of receiving medical care.
